Mailing Address: c/o Canadian Centre for Child Protection Inc615 Academy RdWinnipeg, MB     R3N 0E7
Service Details: - Operates Canada's tipline for reporting the online sexual exploitation of children - Receives and processes tips from the public about potential illegal material or activities regarding the online sexual exploitation of children- Refers any relevant leads to law enforcement and/or child welfare agencies - Provides the public with information, resources, support and referral services
How to Apply: Reports regarding online sexual exploitation of children can be called in or reported through the website
